Metadata.Title: CVE-2025-1744 affecting package cloud-hypervisor for versions less than 32.0-5
Metadata.Description: CVE-2025-1744 affecting package cloud-hypervisor for versions less than 32.0-5. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package cloud-hypervisor is earlier than 32.0-5, affected by CVE-2025-1744
